values:
This event has repeted itself but with another person and i couldnt prevent it again.I wasnt there again.....I dont know what to think right now and im so confused inside, but all i know is that i f**king hate him. Im happy that his parents are giving up on him to and that they arent going to help him this time.He needs to change his life on his own, which, so he had to hit rock bottom to do.What amazes me about the whole thing though is that he dosent see that he did soemething wrong.He thought everything would go back to normal again. NOT!I just dont understand his thinking, it confuses me.I knew this whole event was going to happen one day, I just didnt know when.Yesturday was the day, he chose to f**k up his life even more.I never want to see that a-hole again.I dont care what happens to him, after all of this, because i dont give a damn about him.He didnt give a damn about me.I just hope that its all over and Im never going through this again. I will leave and i was promised that there would be no more men living in my house, or my mom moving in with any other guys.I think she said that last time though, so i dotn really know if i believe her or not.I just know that im never going to let myself go through it, I wil leave. If he comes back tom., because they dont convict him, Im gone until he is gone, because i know that i would say something and create even more problems. I cant hold in my emotions and I will tell someone what i think of them.I've givne up on holdign stuff in, because i have been doing it for so long.I just want it to end or chose a different life.Oh well...im in a blank mood right now and really confused on what to think and feel.
Alison

I hated this week,but CANTERBURY TALES IS DONE!!!...and im never looking at that book ever again. Then im going to get sick of hamlet but thats ok. Then there was this weekend and it was a lot of fun. Friday, lauren, danni and me went trick or treating..it was great, me and lauren kept tripping. It felt kind of weird getting candy from people that were younger than you but thats ok.After that we all went to swensons and i got a smoothie which didnt taste good, but then we went to Acme and hung out with Rob. He didnt have any carts to move really so we moved some carts so he had some work...arent we so nice? Saturday i went to work late cause i woke up at 9:59 and had to be at work at 10..opps..Oh well, but then after work i got ready for the party. I had tia drive me to the party(she is so nice) and the party was fun. It was a lot of fun..drunk pictionary...Oh ya...lol...then i slept and woke up today and have homework to do cause i put it off...oh well thats really all i have to say...lol
Alison
http://emptysmiles24.livejournal.com/11616.html

hey i havent actually updated for awhile so i thought i would. hoemcoming was last saturday, it was ok but i could have been better. cant everything always be better than it really is though? i dunno..im just stressing over school right now, because everything seems so overwhelming and i cant take it. I just really want to give up on this whole ib thing but i cant. I wish i could go to fhs for art and life would just be so much easier. I dunno..im just complaining but its just that ib takes over your life. I mean last year i heard stuff about its so time comsuming but i never thought that it would be that much. I was talking to this one guy today who was telling me that he had to do canterbury tales to and it was hard but he only had to write about a couple tales...which i can understand but for us we got to write about all the stories but 4 of them. I just need sleep and i cant wait for it to be friday...isnt that sad..its only monday...oh well im done...i have homework to do..lol...fun fun...bye bye hope everything is going good for everyone..
Alison

It was a normal day and everything was ok, but then i came home and my mom was the only one home which isnta  good sign, because whenever mike comes home late he is a complete jerk. BUt he isnt drinking at all when he come home at 1 and 2?...YEA RIGHT.Then everthing was stupid because he was so noisy and broke something?...Then decided to get into an argument with my mom over stupid shit, so i went downstairs to tell him to be quiet cause its 2 and we should all be asleep. I guess I was worng for doing that cause supposivly im a bitch who deserves nothing and I am nothing. OH and also his daughter would beat my ass cause he cant..It was so nice.. NOT...so I dont know whats going on but hopefully the bastard goes ack to his fucking house in florida but i dont even think that his parents want him own there cause he called them at like 3. Its a nice hour to call someone that is sleeping but hey whatever i dont know anything.. oh well Im done bitching. 
Alison
http://emptysmiles24.livejournal.com/10774.html

Today had been interesting......I was doing work during the day for school and during the day my mom came and told me that my grandpa has another spot on his good lung. Since my grandma is dead he feels that he has nothing to look forward to in life, so he isnt going to get help for it and slowy die from it.Just more news that i needed to hear.Im worried that when he dies that its going to break up some of the family, which i hope dosent happen.Its confusing and stupid about what is going on and its going to be in interesting year.Then i had a ok time at pizza hut hanging out with the people on my softball team, but i was happy when i had to go..Then me and gariann had fun driving around, but the place that we ended up was different because i got to sit and watch soemtone that i like be with someone else.. fun fun but im not worried about it because its life and i have to get used to it, oh well...i just need to pick a guy that isnt going to screw me over. Im not going to go through the sames things as in the past because its not fun. I want to find one person and be happy knowing that they arent going to another person and being able to trust him.OH well hopefully i find that guy?..Then to top off the night I get home to my mom and mike arguing.Just what i needed to come home too. oh well i think i have talked enough bye bye
http://emptysmiles24.livejournal.com/10640.html

I havent updated for awhile so I thought I would. Softball is over now, we ended in 3rd place which isnt bad and it was great beating the jaguars though.(they need to learn how to be good sprtsmanship, something that they dont have)I wonder who won the chamionship? I guess I'll have to find out later. I got the papers in today about going to court..Im a little worried about it but I need to stay calm. I think tom. I get to pick up my grandpas car to use which will make my life a whole lot easier. I have to really start getting things done. Oh well I hope that everything is going ok.
http://emptysmiles24.livejournal.com/10275.html

Today we lost a great person but she will always be in our hearts and our spirits. She'll be looking over us and helping us with the challenges in life. She was a sweet person that would do anything to put a smile on someones face, to get that satisfaction of helping people out whenever she could. I hope that she knows that we all care about her and she is with us all in our hearts, but i think that she knows that everyone cares, by the way so many have helped her out. Many people willingly gave up their time to help her out when she needed it cause they knew that she would do it for someone if they asked her. She kept her spirits up and Im happy that she got to pass peacefully in her sleep and didnt have to be hooked up to many machines. I love you grandma and I hope that you are in a better place doing all your favorite things.We will all miss you, because you touched so many people in their life. 7/8/04
Alison
http://emptysmiles24.livejournal.com/10070.html

I have had to grow up a lot in the past couple months and as I look back it makes me think about a lot of things(some good and some bad, butr its life). I hope that the next couple months are better, or Im going to be very stressed. 
In the past week I have noticed that I cant get irritated about the small things in life and jsut stay calm.It going to be hard but its something that i have to change cause its making people mad at me.
I  went to cleveland today and saw my grandparents today.My grandma got smaller and my grandpa is starting to walk a lot slower. I swear that my grandma weighs less than 100 pounds and she looks like she is in a lot of pain. Its not good and its so hard to see her in that much pain and not be able to change it cause there isnt a cure for what she has.
I do have good news in september im going to have my artwork up at cafe momus...lol...that is a dream that i have always wanted to do and i cant believe that its actually going to happen but its great.....HAPPY 4TH TO EVERYONE!..hope everything is going great for all of ya.

hey I thought it would be time to update,so i am....the past couple of days have been interesting...mostly working and should of had some games but they were rained out...I looked at the perfect car yesturday but i got there to late ans the person infront of me bought it before i could...(stupid person) oh well i guess it wasnt meant to be? Life is confusing me and i get to work a double tom. cause i need the hours...lol..oh well nothing really more interesting going on...lol..hope everything is going great for everyone..bye

I feel as though everything I touch I ruin...Like nothing in life is supposed to work out for me. In the end all this work that im doing isnt going to change a thing. My moods are changing so much sio quickly and I dont know what to do or how to change it. I wish that I could change things and make everything work out for the best, but life dosent happen like that.Life just throws you curve balls that you have to live with. People are confusing me right now to though,and I dont know what to do or say to them to understand what is going on. oh well, Im thinking to much and shouldnt so im going to go.

SCHOOL IS OVER...THAT IS SUCH A NICE THING TO SAY....LOL...The last day of school i had a lot of fun. I got coffee in the morning(yummmm) and then i took the exams, which sucked. But then it was over and i got to my moms truck and lauren,sarah and rachel had wrote stuff on it...It was hilerious...Later that day i hung out with aly at the mall and we got lost a couple times but thats ok..lol...thats all really but i have to get to work soon, so bye bye

A lot of things have changed in my life in the past few weeks. I have figured out that its sad when i talk to the person that fixed my computer more than my moms bf who i see everyday. I need to become less of a protective person cause supposivly i have no place to day anything when they are agruing.(its stupid) I told her today that he is just like steve, he just hasnt hit her yet, and yea that isnt the nicest thing to say. but i have put up with a lot of shit with him and when she was with steve, they both have the same qualities. Only difference is mike supposivly stopped drinking..(dont belive it too much)..Then this week we have exams and they are stressing me out. Life was great a week ago but now all this crap is happening, i want it to go back. I dunno...im rambling on too much and should stop..so im going to................................

The begining of the week was kinda sucky because of one reason but it was just a stressful situation and I need to learn how to handle things like that. But the rest of the week has been ok i guess, except for messing up a math quiz...oh well its only one...interms are coming next week..eww...lol.Some funny news this week, I foudn out today that when I moved last year I was taken off the IB list.Then when I came back this year they forgot to put me back on it and they just noticed it.I didnt exist..lol...its all first grade again, when i got marked absent but i was sitting in the class..lol.oh well..I hope everyone is doing great

I feel as though i have let that person down, which is a sucky feeling....I just have been messing up on so much stuff lately...oh well...

Its kinda sad how people can sit there and say that they dont have a problem anymore and they dont need help, but then go out and do it again. It pisses me off because its still there and I thought he was doing good. I tried to help, but I dont care anymore. I tried to be nice, I really did, but I just dont care anymore. I dont consider him a person in my life anymore....on an another note, more bad news...why isnt it ever good?..my grandma isnt doing good and they are sure if she is even going to make it for her trip to Hilton Head on april 17th(11 days away), so that she can see some of the family.Im really hoping that I get to see her in the next couple days. I feel bad that I havent been there more for her.

Last night had its up and downs, but in the end i had a great time..lol...Lauren broke my porch..lol..and Tomy and the pickle card..whoa there...lol..it was just fun to have my friends around me, even though they all ganged up on me. Spraying me with silly string, pouring cold water down my white shirt, and making me name 5 cereals...mean people..lol..j/k...oh well I wish i had pictures but i lost my camera but found it in the morning..lol...wow im slow.Then it was nice talking to gariann at night cause i really needed to talk and get the crap off of my mind.Life and love are way too confusing..lol..oh well i hope everything is going great..:)

I look at myself in the mirror and Im not liking what Im seeing.Its not the person that I want to be.I have messed up badly this year school wise and I have to start working harder this grading period to try and get better grades.Its not just that its just my life, Im sick of everything that has happened and that I still think of it when something sounds like it or looks like that same stuff.Its just an annoying thing that Im going to have to live with?Sometimes I just wisht that I could erase things or events that have happened out of my head.Start on a new clean slat, where I can pick the things that I want to happen and know not what to do so that I wont have the same past memories.If that makes any sense.I kinda wish that I could know what is going to happen in the future because I dont think that I could handle anymore bad stuff, I dont want to go down that road with that kind of crap again. No thank you, once was enough to handle.oh well...I cant pick my future and what happens is just going to be more supirses that Im going to have to live with
Alison

Life is that roller coaster that can shift very easily from the top to the bottom before you even notice.Thats exctly what happened to me yesturday, I jinxed myself eariler in the day saying that life was getting better. After I said it I got a werid feeling that something was going to happen at night. Guess what? Something did go wrong.I thought things were going so well and life was going to be ok, but I was living in a dream world. Something going right for me, it just dosent happen. Things just make me think that things will be ok but in reality it isnt. Im sick of thinking that people are going to change cause I dont see a change. Im sick of being told that everything is going to be ok and that life will be better cause we are going to move on and get out of this lifestyle, but we havent since I was in 6th grade. Im getting sick of it and if it dosent change then I might just have to leave cause this is just to much stress and I cant handle it anymore. I just want to live my life where I can come home and know that there wont be anymore fights. To know that I can go to sleep and know that the only thing that is going to wake me up is my alarm in the morning.oh well
http://emptysmiles24.livejournal.com/4614.html

Last weekend was fun, going to the lock in and hanging out with tomy, lauren and tim.Then with no sleep doing a drivers ed class(last one!..lol), lets say I had a lot of coffee to stay awake...lol.Then when I get to school we had OGT Testing today from 1 through 3rd period, I read about pigeons and biology, fun fun..lol.At the class meeting we couldnt stop laughing...lol..Oh well on another note, Life is going ok for me.A lot better than weeks in the past and I think that things might be getting better,but I dont want to jinx myself..oh well I hope that everything is going great for everyone
Alison
http://emptysmiles24.livejournal.com/4420.html

Life is too stressful.This weekend I went to my grandpas b-day party and it was fun seeing the family and all but it was hard to see my grandma in the condition that she is in.It amazes me how much a person can change in less than 6 months, and there is nothing that can prevent it.I really wish there was cause I cant handle seeing her in the condition that she is in.I feel as though I should be doing something but there isnt anything that I can do but be there for her.I have decided that this week Im going to focus on school work and try to bring up my grades in the next week cause I need to do that. grades are closing soon...not cool...oh well that means that the school year is coming to a closer end.(which is good)I hope that everyone is doing great..:)
Alison
http://emptysmiles24.livejournal.com/4207.html

Its kind of funny how people only realize that they have a probelm when they hit rock bottom. By this time they have lost everything and realize that they need help but why not before. You said we were the crazy ones, but now you realize that you are wrong. You were wrong about a lot of things. Now its to late, everyone that cares about are too hurt by the things that you have said. They dont want to even talk to you because you called us every name in the book. We are to hurt to take you back, but we do hope one day that you will get that help and not be the person that you were.That going ro rehab will help you see all the things that you did wrong in your life and what you are going to do in life to prevent this from ever happening again. Right now you look for what comes next but there is nothin but blakness, nothing there.You have no where to go, no one to talk to and nothing to do.This might not make sense to anyone but it does to me,. I was just trying write down these thoughts because Im tired of having then in my head and no where to put them.
http://emptysmiles24.livejournal.com/3884.html

Im sick of everything that has been going on in my life and today things just might have changed for the better,(i really hope so?)I have a lot of stuff to think about and still am confused about so much, but it was his choice. he is ruining his life, it wasnt me or my mom, all he did was mess up his. I happy its over in a way but this whole situtation and basically everything starting the 6th grade is making me realize that i might need to get help. Im not happy and i havent been for awhile, i paint on a smile when im with my friends but really im sad inside.I feel as though im hallow inside with no feelings,lost of words to say. All i can do is sit there with a blank stare as though im stuck a deep thought that im uncapable of coming out of because im stuck.its all catching up to me, all the fighting, late nights, im used to it and i shouldnt be.I feel asthough i could cry, but things will get better cause thats the only place that it can go...oh well i had to get this stuff off my mind...

Hope everyone is doing great!
Alison

Today was ok, until I got home cause then I got a really bad headache, which is going away with meds. but when my mom came home she told me that my grandma isnt doing well and that she fell on sunday and had to get 10 to 12 stitches..suposivly my unlce kit saw her this week and he said that she looks older and more frail.Next weekend my other uncle jon is helping her find a home to go move into..its just hitting me that they cant do anything to pro-long her life, eventually her body is going to run out and she will pass.i just hope that she lives out the rest of her life in peace, but i dont know what im going to do with out her cause she was the person that taught me everything when i was little and introduced me into baking,(which we all know i love to do..lol)im worried about what is going to happen to my grandpa too when he is all alone cause they say that when most people live together for a long time that when one passes the other one follows shortly.its just is a slap in the face i really wish that they had a cure for als and she could get better but it dosent work out like that.cant anything in my life go good for once.i cant handle all this crap...i dont want to see myself when she does pass cause i will be a mess, cause im already crying and she is still here.

I hope that everyone is doing great.
Alison

hey I havent updated this for awhile, so I thought I would cause Im bored. Im realizing that school is getting on my nerves right now for some reason,example.during school I dont feel like myself..I go into my own little world but once Im out of school..Im me again?...Drivers ed class isnt that much fun,except for talking to people. The teacher is making me worried about when I take the test...oh well time will tell, what happens, happens...I also realized that Im much better at giving advice to people about love than I am with my whole love life..oh well thats all that Im going to write tonight...Hope everyone is doing great!...

It was just what i needed to get my mind off of things that were going on in my life..lol...Well than Satuday came and I went to my grandparents and I found out that my grandma wasnt doing as bad as i thought she was but she wasnt doing great...I felt bad cause she couldnt talk well and she had bruises on her face from where she fell.But I get to see them soon again for my grandpas b-day party.Then the rest of the weekend was boring.oh well I dont have anything else to write.so I hope that everyone is doing great.

Today was just another day, nothing really specail happened toady.It was werid though cause a lot of people were out today for being sick so it was kind of quiet, I didnt like it.Then  the Glory tape that mr maxa had got stolen 5th period today so the 7th preiod class couldnt watch it today...we had a free period. The stupid things that people do, what were they thinking. Oh well it was thier choice.I just hope that tonight I get more sleep than last night, I had to much crap on my mind, so I couldnt sleep.
